location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Bruce Simson, Secretary to Government, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Simons writes to Bruce (inaccurately referring to him as Lieutenant instead of Captain) stating that in future the Governor in Council be informed of any casualties amongst medical staff involved in land and marine operations, with as little delay as possible.
